financial_benefits.description: Tonga offers a low tax regime with no personal income tax, making it appealing for investors and expatriates.
Enjoy a relatively low cost of living compared to many Western countries.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Experience the charm of a Pacific island with pristine beaches and a relaxed lifestyle.
Explore Tongan traditions, music, and festivals showcasing Polynesian heritage.

additional_benefits.description: English is widely spoken, alongside Tongan, facilitating communication for international residents.
Enjoy a warm tropical climate year-round, ideal for outdoor activities.

key_consideration: Tonga does not offer specific digital nomad visas; long-term stays may require appropriate visa arrangements or residency permits.
action_comment: Consider Tonga for its relaxed lifestyle, cultural richness, and favorable tax environment.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you spend more than 183 days in Tonga in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: Allows for short-term stays for tourism and business purposes.

income_requirement.misc_details: No specific income requirements for visitor visas; proof of sufficient funds for stay may be requested.

application_fee.details: Application fee varies based on nationality and type of visa applied for.

visas.renewability_details: Visitor visas can typically be extended for longer stays upon application.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Visitor visas do not lead to permanent residency or citizenship.
required_documents: Proof of sufficient funds for stay
Return ticket or onward travel itinerary

visas.key_consideration: For individuals seeking to reside in Tonga for an extended period; requirements include financial stability and medical clearance.

application_fee.details: Fee covers processing costs for residence permits.

visas.renewability_details: Residence permits are renewable based on continued fulfillment of eligibility criteria.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Long-term residence permits can lead to permanent residency after a specified period.
required_documents: Proof of sufficient financial means to support stay
Police clearance certificate from home country
